Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is pushed away short range.

Attacks.Name: Leaf Blade
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Solar Beam
Attacks.Effect: Before using this attack, Leafeon must spend an action to charge. If charged, this attack ignores cover.

Superpowers.Name: Chlorophyll
Superpowers.Effect: If Leafeon starts its activation with 3 or more power, it gains an additional action during its activation.

Superpowers.Name: Synthesis
Superpowers.Effect: Remove up to 3 damage from Leafeon.

Attacks.Name: Razor Leaf
Attacks.Effect: This attack has a piercing effect. If a critical and a wild are rolled, ignore the target's defense dice.
